reviewText:
Mr. Bell's advice to me was to let his show wash over me as if I were sitting in a comfortable chair with a glass of wine in my hand.  If you try to take it in straight ahead, "knowing" it all, going one-on-one with him intellectually, then you are attempting to much (maybe he just meant me but I don't think so).

I have all 40+ of his shows on DVD and I love them, especially the Romantic Period shows.  Mr. Bell is unapologetically intelligent and wants you to be the same.
